scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin views/account.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/account.ejs && usemin views/accountError.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/accountError.ejs && usemin views/checkout.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/checkout.ejs && usemin views/createAccountConformation.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/createAccountConformation.ejs && usemin views/download.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/download.ejs && usemin views/duplicateUsername.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/duplicateUsername.ejs && usemin views/login.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/login.ejs && usemin views/musicPlayer.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/musicPlayer.ejs && usemin views/nicknameError.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/nicknameError.ejs && usemin views/passwordError.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/passwordError.ejs && usemin views/paymentSucceed.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/paymentSucceed.ejs && usemin views/retrieveCredentials.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/retrieveCredentials.ejs && usemin views/songUpload.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/songUpload.ejs
